title: Gift Guide - Condensed Slab Serif
content:
Hello all, does anyone recognize this condensed slab? Found on [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825003039/http:/www.designworklive.com/) blog. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825003039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/giftguide_5926.png)
author: Chris Keegan

comments.content: Thanks Mike, can't believe I didn't recognize it.
